mapper.insert: insert into product_cart(m_id, p_serialNo, p_choiceQuantity, p_choiceSize, p_choiceColor) values(#{m_id}, #{p_serialNo}, #{p_choiceQuantity}, #{p_choiceSize}, "black")
mapper.select: select pd2.*, product.p_product, product.p_price from (select pd.*, img.p_productImg_DM from product_cart as pd left join product_img_dm as img on pd.p_serialNo=img.p_serialNo) as pd2 left join product on pd2.p_serialNo=product.p_serialNo where pd2.m_id = #{id}
